## Adding New Syllabi

To add a new syllabus to this site:

1. Create a new folder in the `syllabi/` directory
2. Add your syllabus as a `.qmd` file
3. Configure the syllabus to render to HTML, PDF, and Word formats
4. Add links to this page following the pattern above
5. Render the website with `quarto render`
